Name: Grand Duchess Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: This vodka-based Tiki-style cocktail is made "funky" by a splash of pot still Jamaican rum while lime juice adds freshness and grenadine adds both a rich hue and sweetness.
Nutrition: One serving of Grand Duchess Cocktail contains 175 calories
